Pemprov-DPRD Gorontalo Siapkan Pembangunan RS Ainun Habibie
06 Nov 2019, 03:42 by Tim detikcom
Jakarta - Pemprov Gorontalo tengah mempersiapkan pembangunan Rumah Sakit (RS) Ainun Habibie. Wakil Gubernur Gorontalo Idris Rahim mengatakan pembicaraan tentang pembangunan rumah sakit sedang dibahas di DPRD Gorontalo dan sudah hampir rampung.
"Sekarang ini sedang berproses di DPRD. Legal opinion atau pertimbangan hukum sudah ada dari Kejaksaan Tinggi Gorontalo. Kalau semua sudah siap, akan segera ditindaklanjuti," kata Idris seperti dilansir Antara, Rabu (6/11/2019).
Ketua DPRD Provinsi Gorontalo Paris A Jusuf menyebut sudah ada tiga kesepakatan di DPRD. Saat ini proses anggaran untuk pembangunan itu sudah dibicarakan di setiap fraksi DPRD dan akan disetujui.
"Alhamdulillah ada kesepakatan pemahaman untuk tiga hal. Pertama, pembicaraan tim simpul dengan DPRD itu sudah selesai. Kedua, persetujuan kami akan bicarakan di tingkat Bamus (Badan Musyawarah DPRD). Ketiga, seluruh rekomendasi, seluruh pemaparan, seluruh dokumen itu menjadi bahan fraksi-fraksi untuk dasar persetujuan," ujar Paris.
Sementara itu, anggota DPRD Provinsi Gorontalo Adhan Dambea mengatakan akan mengkaji anggaran pembangunan rumah sakit itu. Ia juga meminta Pemprov Gorontalo memperhatikan betul usulan anggaran untuk pembangunan rumah sakit ini agar tidak mengganggu kepentingan rakyat.
"Kalau pola itu kita gunakan, kita harus kaji jangan sampai mengganggu kepentingan rakyat. Saya kasih contoh, kalau perjalanan dinas anggota DPRD tahun ini Rp 55 miliar, ya kita potong mungkin tinggal Rp 30 miliar. Begitu juga eksekutif, misalnya Rp 100 miliar, kita potong Rp 50 miliar sehingga sudah ada Rp 75 miliar," usulnya.

Gorontalo Provincial Government-DPRD Prepares Development of Ainun Habibie Hospital
Nov 6 2019, 03:42 by Tim detikcom
Jakarta - Gorontalo Provincial Government is preparing to build the Ainun Habibie Hospital (RS). Gorontalo Deputy Governor Idris Rahim said discussions about the construction of the hospital were being discussed in the Gorontalo DPRD and were almost complete.
"Right now it is being processed in the DPRD. Legal opinion or legal considerations already exist from the Gorontalo High Prosecutor's Office. If everything is ready, it will be immediately followed up," Idris said as reported by Antara on Wednesday (6/11/2019).
Chairman of the Gorontalo Province DPRD Paris A Jusuf said there had been three agreements in the DPRD. At present the budget process for development has been discussed in each DPRD faction and will be approved.
"Thank God there is an understanding agreement for three things. First, the discussion between the knot team and the DPRD has been completed. Second, our agreement will be discussed at the Bamus (DPRD Deliberation Board) level. Third, all recommendations, all presentations, all documents become material for the factions. faction for the basis of the agreement, "Paris said.
Meanwhile, Gorontalo Province DPRD member Adhan Dambea said he would review the hospital's construction budget. He also asked the Gorontalo Provincial Government to pay close attention to the proposed budget for the construction of this hospital so that it would not interfere with the people's interests.
"If we use this pattern, we must examine not to disturb the interests of the people. Let me give an example, if the DPRD members' official travel this year is Rp. 55 billion, then we cut it may be Rp. 30 billion. Likewise for executives, for example Rp. 100 billion, we cut 50 billion rupiah so there is already 75 billion rupiah, "he suggested.
